title: A font similar to Swiss721?
content: Hey - for me, I'd spend the $40 and get Swiss, but I have a client asking if there are any free fonts that are similar. Lame? Yes. But I figured I'd put it out there. Thanks!
author: macgee

comments.content:
How about Helvetica?  
Systemfont installed about everywhere.
That's what I said, but it's "not close enough". Oy.

Free? Nimbus Sans L

But of course, both are actually Helvetica.
If Swiss 721 isn't close enough to Helvetica, your connaisseur should really spend the 40$ on it :)

Not close enough???  
Swiss 721 is a Helvetica-clone!

Maybe another clone: Arial.
